topic: History Workflow Series ("Literary Movements and Divine Comedy explorative search")

goals.1: Who wrote The Divine Comedy? (return the IRI and the label of the author)
goals.3: Identify the BGP for literary movement
goals.4: Return the poets born in the same place of the author of The Divine Comedy who are born between 1300 and 1500 (1300 and 1500 included) (the result set must be a list of couples poets IRI and label).
goals.5: Identify the BGP for literary work
goals.6: Compare the author of The Divine Comedy with Giovanni Boccaccio. Return for these poets the number of literary work they wrote (the result set must be two triples -one for each author- author IRI, label and #literary work).
goals.7: Consider italian poets, their place of birth (the city) and their university education. Return for each city the number of poets who born there and who was educated there (the result set must be a list of triples city IRI, label and #poets).
goals.8: Return the italian poets who won the Nobel Prize in Literature (the result set must be poet IRI and label).

name: 30dab0890d

1.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?p ?name WHERE { wd:Q40185 ?p ?obj . ?p sc:name ?name. } LIMIT 20
